8. HOW LONG WE RETAIN YOUR INFORMATION

text: We may share the information we collect in connection with a merger, sale, acquisition, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, bankruptcy or other change of ownership or control.

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, store, and share your personal information and how we protect it.
